title: Ranged combat tutor

properties.name: description
properties.value: Nemarti is one of the three Combat tutors, known to be the instructor for both Ranged and Fletching. She is located on a small hill north of Lumbridge Castle. While she is most likely intended to help new players, she gives information about Ranged in combat.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ranged combat tutor
Ranged combat tutor
Released27 September 2006 (Update)
MembersNo
RaceHuman
LocationLumbridge
GenderFemale
OptionsTalk-to, Claim
ExamineNemarti looks ready to teach you about ranged combat.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID3217

Nemarti is one of the three Combat tutors, known to be the instructor for both Ranged and Fletching. She is located on a small hill north of Lumbridge Castle. While she is most likely intended to help new players, she gives information about Ranged in combat.

Players can toggle ammunition auto-equipping or going to their inventory by talking to her.

Every 30 minutes, players can claim a training bow and 25 training arrows for free, regardless of their Ranged level, as long as there are none in their bank or inventory. Players also need to not have claimed the air and mind runes from the Magic combat tutor in the last 30 minutes either.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
17 August 2017
(update | poll)

Players can now talk to the Ranged tutor in Lumbridge in order to toggle the ability to have ammunition returned to their worn inventory, bolt pouch, or blowpipe when picking it up.
